services.title: Our Services
services.description1: We guide you through your IAM journey, helping you develop a robust strategy and make informed decisions.
services.description2: Our consultancy translate your business needs into functional requirements and help you select the right IAM technology.
services.description3: Our certified professionals deliver seamless implementation of your chosen IAM solutions, ensuring minimal disruption to your operations.
services.description4: We employ a structured approach to testing, ensuring the quality and reliability of your IAM systems before deployment.
services.description5: We connect your IAM solution with various applications, enabling a coordinated and unified approach to identity management.
services.description6: Empower your team with our support services, or let us handle your IAM operations entirely, ensuring continuous protection and efficiency.

hero.title: Be praktigal!
hero.description: Join us and shape the future of IAM with a collaborative dynamic team of experts!

topTeam.title: Top Team, Smart Solutions
topTeam.description: Our team, composed of the industry's top IAM professionals, specializes in delivering innovative solutions across sectors such as finance, automotive, healthcare, and public sector.

career.title: Career
career.description: We're dedicated to nurturing your growth through diverse career paths, extensive training, and unlocking your potential. Join us to learn, grow, and excel!

wellBeing.title: Well-being
wellBeing.description: We prioritize work-life balance with flexibility while fostering growth and support. It's not just a job; it's where you thrive personally and professionally.

companyCulture.title: Company Culture
companyCulture.description: We foster teamwork, innovation, diversity, and inclusivity, creating an environment where everyone can contribute and succeed.

trust.title: Trust & Competence
trust.content: Praktiga Consulting is where the best IAM (Identity and Access Management) experts come together. We're a team with deep experience in IAM solutions, making a difference in industries like finance, automotive, healthcare, and government.
trust.content2: We understand the challenges faced by organizations, having been in the same position as our clients are now — responsible for integrating and maintaining a product that touches virtually every aspect of their company's infrastructure. At that critical juncture, finding a reliable partner becomes paramount, someone you can trust to steer you in the right direction.
trust.content3: Praktiga is a global force with dynamic teams in Germany and Turkey. Our mission is simple: You focus on your business, and we'll take care of your IAM journey, ensuring it's secure, compliant, and efficient. Welcome to Praktiga Consulting – your partner in navigating IAM challenges.

contact.description: Our experts are ready to help! Contact us via any of the following channels:

expertConsultants.title: Expert Consultants
expertConsultants.description: Our team comprises industry veterans with extensive experience in IAM.

tailoredSolutions.title: Tailored Solutions
tailoredSolutions.description: We customize our services to meet your specific needs and challenges.

provenTrackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
provenTrackRecord.description: Trusted by leading enterprises, we deliver measurable, secure, and compliant IAM solutions.

comprehensiveSupport.title: Comprehensive Support
comprehensiveSupport.description: From strategy to implementation, we provide ongoing support to ensure your success.

privacy.general_information_text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website. Personal data is all data with which you can be personally identified. You can find detailed information on the subject of data protection in our data protection declaration listed under this text.
privacy.responsible_for_data_collection: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
privacy.data_processing: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find his contact details in the imprint of this website.
privacy.how_we_collect_data: How do we collect your data?
privacy.data_communication: On the one hand, your data is collected when you communicate it to us. This may, for example, be data that you enter in a contact form.
privacy.technical_data: Other data is automatically recorded by our IT systems when you visit the website. This is primarily technical data (e.g. Internet browser, operating system or time of page access). This data is recorded automatically as soon as you enter our website.
privacy.operators_take_protection: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration.
privacy.responsible_body_info: The responsible body for data processing on this website is: Praktiga Consulting GmbH, Southern Munich Street 62, 82031 Grünwald, Germany. Responsible: Yavuz Gürcan.
privacy.revocation_of_consent: Revocation of your consent to data processing
privacy.revocation_info: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke your consent at any time. All you need to do is send us an informal email. The legality of the data processing carried out up to the time of revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
privacy.right_to_lodge_complaint: Right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority
privacy.complaint_info: In the event of violations of data protection law, the person affected has the right to lodge a complaint with the responsible supervisory authority. The responsible supervisory authority for data protection issues is the state data protection officer of the federal state in which our company is based.
privacy.portability_info: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you request that the data be transferred directly to another responsible party, this will only be done if it is technically feasible.
privacy.encryption_info: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or enquiries that you send to us as the site operator, this site uses SSL or TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from "http://" to "https://" and by the lock symbol in your browser line.

legal.managing_directors: Managing Directors: Dinçer Alkaç, Yavuz Gürcan
legal.vat_id_number: VAT Identification Number according to §27 a of the German VAT Act: TBA
legal.content_responsibility: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
legal.content_responsible_person: Yavuz Gürcan, Südliche Münchner Str. 62, 82031 Grünwald, Germany

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: Secure your business with Praktiga. Contact us today to learn how we can support your IAM needs and help you focus on your core business.
